text.text: This is an advertisement for Wily Industries's Geologically Unstable Terrain Surveyor.  It shows large robot wearing a construction hardhat preventing a fallen boulder from crushing a worker.

This is one of the many posters printed by Wily Industries, before the cataclysm. This poster features a sniper robot's green helmet, with the trademark eerily glowing eye. The caption reads, in bold  "KEEP QUIET, CARELESS TALK COSTS LIVES."
This is a poster printed by Wily Industries. This poster depicts a Met Civil Protector robot, in black, red and white. The caption reads, in bold  "WE WILL KEEP YOU SAFE."
This is a poster printed by Wily Industries. This poster depicts a Met Civil Protector robot, in black, red and white. The caption reads, in bold  "DO NOT COMPROMISE YOUR SAFETY."
"Those creepy-ass mets aren't as tough as the helmet robots, but they don't seem to do much anyways."

"I met this cyborg, pretty friendly, unlike the majority. I chatted with him about various things, pretty decent, but man, what kind of messed up stories he was telling me. That he saw some shit they were doing in these labs long before all this mess. Creatures, not even humans, compared to him, made out of blob. Yeah, artificial blob humans that just like him were turned into cyborgs. What kind of shit is this? Did they know about all this long before it happened? Man, it's messed up. I don't know."
